mapper.sql: cs.id, cs.user_id, cs.doctor_id, cs.request_id, cs.status, cs.last_message_time, cs.create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into chat_session
user_id,
doctor_id,
request_id,
status,
last_message_time,
create_time,
#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{requestId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{lastMessageTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select: select , u.name as user_name, u.img as user_img, d.name as doctor_name, d.img as doctor_img from chat_session cs left join user u on cs.user_id = u.id left join user d on cs.doctor_id = d.id where cs.id = #{id}

select , u.name as user_name, u.img as user_img, d.name as doctor_name, d.img as doctor_img, (select count(*) from chat_message cm where cm.session_id = cs.id and cm.receiver_id = #{userId} and cm.is_read = 0) as unread_count, (select cm.content from chat_message cm where cm.session_id = cs.id order by cm.create_time desc limit 1) as last_message_content, (select cm.message_type from chat_message cm where cm.session_id = cs.id order by cm.create_time desc limit 1) as last_message_type from chat_session cs left join user u on cs.user_id = u.id left join user d on cs.doctor_id = d.id where cs.user_id = #{userId} and cs.status = 1 order by cs.last_message_time desc, cs.create_time desc

select , u.name as user_name, u.img as user_img, d.name as doctor_name, d.img as doctor_img, (select count(*) from chat_message cm where cm.session_id = cs.id and cm.receiver_id = #{doctorId} and cm.is_read = 0) as unread_count, (select cm.content from chat_message cm where cm.session_id = cs.id order by cm.create_time desc limit 1) as last_message_content, (select cm.message_type from chat_message cm where cm.session_id = cs.id order by cm.create_time desc limit 1) as last_message_type from chat_session cs left join user u on cs.user_id = u.id left join user d on cs.doctor_id = d.id where cs.doctor_id = #{doctorId} and cs.status = 1 order by cs.last_message_time desc, cs.create_time desc

select , u.name as user_name, u.img as user_img, d.name as doctor_name, d.img as doctor_img from chat_session cs left join user u on cs.user_id = u.id left join user d on cs.doctor_id = d.id where cs.user_id = #{userId} and cs.doctor_id = #{doctorId} and cs.status = 1 limit 1
